embeds.description: In all channels, please be as specific as possible when describing the bug or issue. The more information you provide, the easier it will be for us to fix the problem.

embeds.title: Bug Triage
embeds.description:
Critical
- Severe impact on core gameplay mechanics or essential features
- Immediate action required
- Example: Game crashes, severe lag issues, critical UI bugs affecting core functionality

High
- Significant impact on player experience or important features
- Urgent fix needed
- Example: Major performance issues, important gameplay mechanic bugs

Medium
- Noticeable impact on player experience or secondary features
- Should be addressed promptly
- Example: Moderate performance issues, important UX bugs not blocking core gameplay

Low:
- Minimal impact on gameplay experience or cosmetic issues
- Can be addressed after higher priority items
- Example: Minor visual glitches, non-essential feature bugs

Trivial
- No significant impact on gameplay or user experience
- Can be addressed last
- Example: Typos, minor layout issues not affecting gameplay

embeds.title: Channel Functions
embeds.description:
<#1303778428520239176> - Please use this channel to share your ideas for new features or improvements to existing features.

<#1303779639495360620> - Please use this channel to report any bugs or issues you find with gameplay.

<#1303779731258343555> - Please use this channel to report any bugs or issues you find with maps.

<#1303778761388458068> - Please use this channel to report any bugs or issues you find with the game's visuals.
Thank you for your help in ensuring that we deliver a high-quality product!
